about_the_game:
The Level Limit Breach 2 is a 3x item set where all party members' max level is increased by 100.

The Level Limit Breach 2 includes:

・Limit Breaker Potion 4
・Limit Breaker Potion 5
・Limit Breaker Potion 6
detailed_description:
The Level Limit Breach 2 is a 3x item set where all party members' max level is increased by 100.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

short_description: The Level Limit Breaker 2 is a three item set where all party members' max level is increased by 100.
